event: right extra anatomical axillobifemoral bypass graft
right upper quadrant and right flank tenderness
chest X-ray showing gas under the right hemi-diaphragm
right perinephric collection with extension into the right sub-phrenic region
gas in the right collecting system and urinary bladder
no gas in the renal parenchyma
open drainage of a very thick, foul smelly, loculated perinephric and sub-phrenic collection
very abnormal bladder mucosa with multiple cystic lesions with air “bubbles”
ureteric Double J stent inserted in the right ureter
urethral catheter to drain the bladder
culture of the collection showed Klebsiella pneumonia extended-spectrum β-lactamase
severe sepsis and multiple organ failure
